Just a small nitpick: we agreed that if such parameters do not fit in on line, we line wrap after each parameter:
setSpan(new ForegroundColorSpan(color),
0,
newItemTitle.length(),
Spannable.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE);
aligned by opening bracket.
Reason is that git diff is then more easier to read if a parameter changes.
This can be kept this way, but for future :)
Ok ! I'll try to put a parameter on each line for future ;)
